EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalTaxE.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Income Tax Benefit from Share-based Compensation
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalTaxE.description: Amount of increase in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from a tax benefit associated with share-based compensation plan other than an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP). Includes, but is not limited to, excess tax benefit.

BankingRegulationCapitalConservationBuff.label: Banking Regulation, Capital Conservation Buffer, Capital Conserved, Minimum
BankingRegulationCapitalConservationBuff.description: Minimum capital conservation buffer percentage required to avoid restriction on payout amount of eligible retained income as defined by regulatory framework.

ChangeInUnrealizedGainLossOnFairValueHed.label: Change in Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Fair Value Hedging Instruments
ChangeInUnrealizedGainLossOnFairValueHed.description: Amount of gain (loss) from the increase (decrease) in fair value of derivative and nonderivative instruments designated as fair value hedging instruments recognized in the income statement.

ChangeInUnrealizedGainLossOnHedgedItemIn.label: Change in Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Hedged Item in Fair Value Hedge
ChangeInUnrealizedGainLossOnHedgedItemIn.description: Amount of the increase (decrease) in fair value of the hedged item in a fair value hedge recognized in the income statement.

CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Declared
CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.description: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

CommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Common Stock, Shares, Outstanding
CommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares of common stock outstanding. Common stock represent the ownership interest in a corporation.

CumulativeEffectOfInitialAdoptionOfNewAc.label: Cumulative Effect of Initial Adoption of New Accounting Principle (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
CumulativeEffectOfInitialAdoptionOfNewAc.description: Cumulative effect of initial adoption of new accounting principle on beginning retained earnings, net of tax. This element can be used, generally, for the adjustment to retained earnings of a new accounting principle.

CurrentForeignTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Foreign Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentForeignTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current foreign income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to taxable income (loss) from continuing operations.

CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current State and Local Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredForeignIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Foreign Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredForeignIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred foreign income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredStateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBen.label: Deferred State and Local Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredStateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBen.description: Amount of deferred state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DerivativeInstrumentsGainLossRecognizedI.label: Derivative Instruments, Gain (Loss) Recognized in Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Effective Portion, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
DerivativeInstrumentsGainLossRecognizedI.description: The effective portion of gains and losses (net) on derivative instruments designated and qualifying as hedging instruments that was recognized in other comprehensive income during the current period.

DividendsPreferredStockStock.label: Dividends, Preferred Stock, Stock
DividendsPreferredStockStock.description: Amount of paid and unpaid preferred stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in stock.

EarningsPerShareBasic.label: Earnings Per Share, Basic
EarningsPerShareBasic.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.description: Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

ExtraordinaryItemNetOfTax.label: Extraordinary Item, Gain (Loss), Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
ExtraordinaryItemNetOfTax.description: Net of tax amount of gain (loss) classified as extraordinary item, including amount attributable to noncontrolling interests.

FeesAndCommissionsOther.label: Fees and Commissions, Other (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
FeesAndCommissionsOther.description: Amount of fee and commission revenue classified as other.

FloorBrokerageExchangeAndClearanceFees.label: Floor Brokerage, Exchange and Clearance Fees
FloorBrokerageExchangeAndClearanceFees.description: The amount of expense during the period for floor brokerage fees paid to other broker-dealers to execute trades on their behalf, stock exchange fees, order flow fees, and clearance fees.

GainLossOnFairValueHedgesRecognizedInEar.label: Gain (Loss) on Fair Value Hedges Recognized in Earnings
GainLossOnFairValueHedgesRecognizedInEar.description: Total amount of gain (loss) derived from fair value hedges recognized in earnings in the period.

GainLossRelatedToLitigationSettlement.label: Gain (Loss) Related to Litigation Settlement
GainLossRelatedToLitigationSettlement.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in settlement of litigation and insurance claims. Excludes claims within an insurance entity's normal claims settlement process.

GeneralInsuranceExpense.label: General Insurance Expense
GeneralInsuranceExpense.description: The expense in the period incurred with respect to protection provided by insurance entities against risks other than risks associated with production (which are allocated to cost of sales).

IncomeLossBeforeExtraordinaryItemsAndCum.label: Income (Loss) from Operations before Extraordinary Items (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
IncomeLossBeforeExtraordinaryItemsAndCum.description: Income or Loss from continuing operations, net of taxes, including net Income or Loss from discontinued operations but before extraordinary items.

IncomeLossBeforeExtraordinaryItemsAndCum.label: Income (Loss) from Operations before Extraordinary Items, Per Basic Share (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
IncomeLossBeforeExtraordinaryItemsAndCum.description: The amount of net Income or Loss before extraordinary items per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Foreign
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: The portion of earnings or loss from continuing operations before income taxes that is attributable to foreign operations, which is defined as Income or Loss generated from operations located outside the entity's country of domicile.

IncomeTaxExaminationInterestExpense.label: Income Tax Examination, Interest Expense
IncomeTaxExaminationInterestExpense.description: The amount of estimated interest recognized in the period arising from income tax examinations.

IncomeTaxExaminationPenaltiesAndInterest.label: Income Tax Examination, Penalties and Interest Expense
IncomeTaxExaminationPenaltiesAndInterest.description: The sum of the amounts of estimated penalties and interest recognized in the period arising from income tax examinations.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitExtraordinaryItem.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Extraordinary Items (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitExtraordinaryItem.description: The sum of the current income tax expense or benefit and the deferred income tax expense or benefit allocated to Income or Loss from extraordinary items.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InterestIncomeExpenseNet.label: Interest Income (Expense), Net
InterestIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of operating interest income (expense).

LegalFees.label: Legal Fees
LegalFees.description: The amount of expense provided in the period for legal costs incurred on or before the balance sheet date pertaining to resolved, pending or threatened litigation, including arbitration and mediation proceedings.

LitigationSettlementAmount.label: Litigation Settlement, Amount (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
LitigationSettlementAmount.description: Amount of judgment or settlement awarded to (against) the entity in respect of litigation.

LitigationSettlementExpense.label: Litigation Settlement, Expense
LitigationSettlementExpense.description: Amount of litigation expense, including but not limited to legal, forensic, accounting, and investigative fees.

LossContingencyDamagesSoughtValue.label: Loss Contingency, Damages Sought, Value
LossContingencyDamagesSoughtValue.description: The value (monetary amount) of the award the plaintiff seeks in the legal matter.

LossContingencyEstimateOfPossibleLoss.label: Loss Contingency, Estimate of Possible Loss
LossContingencyEstimateOfPossibleLoss.description: Reflects the estimated amount of loss from the specified contingency as of the balance sheet date.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

NoninterestExpense.label: Noninterest Expense
NoninterestExpense.description: Total aggregate amount of all noninterest expense.

NoninterestIncomeOtherOperatingIncome.label: Noninterest Income, Other Operating Income
NoninterestIncomeOtherOperatingIncome.description: Amount of revenue earned, classified as other, excluding interest income.

OciBeforeReclassificationsNetOfTaxAttrib.label: OCI, before Reclassifications, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
OciBeforeReclassificationsNetOfTaxAttrib.description: Amount after tax, before reclassification adjustments, of other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to parent.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeReclas.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Reclassifications, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeReclas.description: Amount after tax, before reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.description: Amount after tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOt.label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, after Reclassification Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOt.description: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Defined Benefit Plan, Gain (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for gain (loss) of defined benefit plan.

OtherExtraordinaryGainLoss.label: Other Extraordinary Gain (Loss) (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
OtherExtraordinaryGainLoss.description: Gains (losses) arising from all events or transactions meeting the criteria of unusual in nature and infrequent in occurrence not other defined. Classified separately in the income statement if it is material in relation to income before extraordinary items or to the trend of annual earnings before extraordinary items, or is material by other appropriate criteria. This element is gross of the related tax effect.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherNoninterestExpense.label: Other Noninterest Expense
OtherNoninterestExpense.description: Amount of noninterest expense classified as other.

OtherOperatingIncome.label: Other Operating Income
OtherOperatingIncome.description: The total amount of other operating income, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.label: Other Operating Income (Expense), Net
OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of other operating income and expenses, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operations.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.description: Proceeds from issuance of capital stock which provides for a specific dividend that is paid to the shareholders before any dividends to common stockholders and which takes precedence over common stockholders in the event of liquidation.

ReclassificationFromAccumulatedOtherComp.label: Reclassification from Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income, Current Period, Net of Tax
ReclassificationFromAccumulatedOtherComp.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodNet.label: Reclassification from AOCI, Current Period, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodNet.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

RestructuringAndRelatedCostExpectedCost.label: Restructuring and Related Cost, Expected Cost (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
RestructuringAndRelatedCostExpectedCost.description: Amount expected to be recognized in earnings for the specified restructuring cost.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Dividend Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated dividend rate (a percentage of the share price) to be paid (expected dividends) to holders of the underlying shares over the option's term.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Volatility Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated measure of the percentage by which a share price is expected to fluctuate during a period. Volatility also may be defined as a probability-weighted measure of the dispersion of returns about the mean. The volatility of a share price is the standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a specified period. That is the same as the standard deviation of the differences in the natural logarithms of the stock prices plus dividends, if any, over the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ChangeInTaxRateIn.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Change in Tax Rate, Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ChangeInTaxRateIn.description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) for remeasurement of deferred tax from change in tax rate pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ReclassificationF.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Reclassification from AOCI to Retained Earnings, Tax Effect
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ReclassificationF.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for reclassification to retained earnings of tax effect from remeasurement of deferred tax pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

UndistributedEarningsOfForeignSubsidiari.label: Undistributed Earnings of Foreign Subsidiaries
UndistributedEarningsOfForeignSubsidiari.description: Amount of undistributed earnings of foreign subsidiaries intended to be permanently reinvested outside the country of domicile.

VariableInterestEntityEntityMaximumLossE.label: Variable Interest Entity, Reporting Entity Involvement, Maximum Loss Exposure, Amount
VariableInterestEntityEntityMaximumLossE.description: The reporting entity's maximum amount of exposure to loss as a result of its involvement with the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

DerivativeFairValueHedgeIncludedInEffect.label: Derivative, Fair Value Hedge, Included in Effectiveness, Gain (Loss)
DerivativeFairValueHedgeIncludedInEffect.description: Amount of gain (loss) on derivative instrument designated and qualifying as fair value hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, recognized in earnings.

PreferredStockDividendsIncomeStatementIm.label: Preferred Stock Dividends, Income Statement Impact
PreferredStockDividendsIncomeStatementIm.description: The amount of preferred stock dividends that is an adjustment to net income apportioned to common stockholders.
